commit.message:
Merge #788

788: gccrs: add the `-frust-crate=` option to set the crate name r=philberty a=mathstuf

Signed-off-by: Ben Boeckel <mathstuf@gmail.com>

Fixes: #627 

Co-authored-by: Ben Boeckel <mathstuf@gmail.com>

Merge #788

788: gccrs: add the `-frust-crate=` option to set the crate name r=philberty a=mathstuf

Signed-off-by: Ben Boeckel <mathstuf@gmail.com>

Fixes: #627 

Co-authored-by: Ben Boeckel <mathstuf@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -34,6 +34,10 @@ L
 Rust Joined Separate
 ; Not documented
 
+frust-crate=
+Rust Joined RejectNegative
+-frust-crate=<name>             Set the crate name for the compilation
+
 frust-debug
 Rust Var(flag_rust_debug)
 Dump various Rust front end internals.
